Una re cagada. No se cual fue la necesidad de cambiar los movimientos de los personajes. Encima esto generÃ³ un bug en el que el killer te da un hit y el hitbox esta el doble de ampliado. Es un juego con un objetivo claro, cada partida se diferencia de otra en la variedad de mapas, asesinos y habilidades, es necesario improvisar la mejor estrategia para ganar, el matchmaking en cieros horarios puede llegar a demorar y mas si buscas jugar como asesino, aÃºn asÃ­ me parece un buen juego digno de jugar si te gusta saltar de la adrenalina.

I mean. The game is addictive. Very. And that's the problem. After 521 hours in the game, you kinda get used to some things - toxic people in chat all over the place, faulty hitboxes, bugs every minute. Okay. Devs are trying really hard to make this game more and more playable. But as of now, I would not recommend it to anyone. Just wait, wait and wait. Also, do not buy the game if you do not intend to spend at least 70$ on DLCs. Without them the game is unplayable.
this game is fun, but also sucky. but you should get it

Fun game if you can find a lobby :). Jokes aside it's fun and I recommend it to anyone who wants a "spoopy" game to play. It's  the best survival horror game out there right now, but then again there arent realy any other killer vs survivers games out there. 8/10 worth 20$
o jogo Ã© muito divertido e por conta disso te faz ficar mt preso jogando ele, recomendo pra caramba jogo bom do k7
good game , muchas horas de diversion aseguradas !

fix it. broken hitboxes. vacuums shouldnt exist. areas around pallets where you cant use them. inconsistency. i like the game, but its so buggy and ive been playing on console before this and were years in at this point and it plays like a beta game. work harder to fix what is already in the game. new content is not what players who stick to the game want. stop being greedy.
